title: Thoughts on my discussion
body: So for the all the perms ban  accounts I speak on behalf of them all like people have spent money on this game just to lose It all yes we have all been toxic and stuff but I think that we should be allowed one last chance from a permed ban like disable there chat forever or like but all the toxic people together make a new server for us ill happily lead it you know chuck us on a seprite server for a year and if they redeem them selves then put them back in
